title: Comparing different school terms in Power BI
excerpt: How to implement the comparison between school terms. The same technique can be applied to any arbitrary time periods that do not match regular months or quarters in a calendar, such as seasons or campaigns.  Article and download: https://sql.bi/805847?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt
